basic.name: Flash Heal (Q)
basic.description: Cast for 0.75 seconds to heal an allied Hero for 280.

basic.name: Divine Star (W)
basic.description: Send light that deals 140 damage to enemies and then returns to Anduin, healing allied Heroes for 130 in a wider path. Healing increases by 25% per enemy Hero hit.

basic.name: Chastise (E)
basic.description: Shove a swell of light forward, dealing 175 damage to the first enemy Hero hit and Rooting them for 1.25 seconds.

heroic.name: Holy Word: Salvation (R)
heroic.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for 3 seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to 30% of their max Health and are Protected.

heroic.name: Lightbomb (R)
heroic.description: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After 1.5 seconds, it explodes, dealing 150 damage to enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.The target gains a Shield that absorbs 165 damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for 5 seconds.

trait.name: Leap of Faith (T)
trait.description: Faith instantly pulls an allied Hero to Anduin's location, granting them Unstoppable while they travel. {highlight}Damaging an enemy Hero increases Movement Speed by 2.5% and heals by 3.75% for 6 seconds. These effects stack up to 8 times.{/highlight}

1.name: Evenhanded Blessings
1.description: If Flash Heal is cast on a different target from its last, increase its healing by 15% and refund 40% of its cooldown.

1.name: Binding Heal
1.description: {highlight}Casting Flash Heal on an ally heals Anduin for 135. Anduin receive 100% attack speed bonus for the next two basic attacks.{/highlight}

1.name: Renew
1.description: {highlight}If Flash Heal is used at a stunned, rooted or silenced target it will be recast after 2 seconds on the same target. If Leap of Faith cooldown is available the second healing is increased by 100%{/highlight}

4.name: Smite
4.description: Anduin can use Flash Heal on a chastized enemy dealing damage instead and launching basic attacks on close enemy heroes.

4.name: Surge of Light
4.description: Basic Attacks reduce the cooldown of Chastise by 0.75 seconds. Basic Attacks against {highlight}rooted heroes{/highlight} launch an additional Basic Attack and restore 25 Mana.

4.name: Piercing Light
4.description: Chastise pierces to hit an additional Hero.Quest: Hitting two Heroes with a single Chastise permanently increases Spell Power by 1, to a maximum of 10.

7.name: Lightwell
7.description: Summon a Lightwell that periodically heals a nearby allied Hero for 50. The well only fades after healing 15 times or when recast.This cooldown is reduced by 1 second each time Anduin heals an allied Hero.

7.name: Blessed Recovery
7.description: {highlight}If Anduin loses more than 8% of his maximum Health at once, recover 15% Health over 3 seconds. During the healing Anduin is immune to Silences and Slows. This effect has a 15 second cooldown.Current Health required: 133{/highlight}

7.name: Desperate Prayer
7.description: Activate to instantly heal an allied Hero for 375, but kneel for 2 seconds, unable to act.

10.name: Holy Word: Salvation
10.description: After 0.5 seconds, Channel to invoke the Light for 3 seconds. While nearby, allied Heroes heal for up to 30% of their max Health and are Protected.

10.name: Lightbomb
10.description: Imbue an allied Hero with the Light. After 1.5 seconds, it explodes, dealing 150 damage to enemies and Stunning them for 1.25 seconds.The target gains a Shield that absorbs 165 damage per enemy Hero hit. Lasts for 5 seconds.

13.name: Speed of the Pious
13.description: While Divine Star is traveling, gain 30% {highlight}stacking{/highlight} Movement Speed. Each allied Hero healed by Divine Star on its return to Anduin reduces its cooldown by 1 second.
passives: {highlight}Basic Attacks against enemies gives 10% movement speed to the closest hero to Anduin for 1 second.{/highlight}

13.name: Power Word: Fortitude
13.description: {highlight}The healing done by Divine Star will be converted on temporary max health that lasts 6 seconds.{/highlight}
passives: {highlight}Basic Attacks against enemy Heroes heal the lowest Health allied Hero near Anduin for 32.{/highlight}

13.name: Moral Compass
13.description: Divine Star fires Basic Attacks at Heroes close to its apex.
passives: {highlight}Basic Attacks burn enemy heroes for 87 damage over 3 seconds and Anduin heals for 50% of the damage dealt.{/highlight}

16.name: Inner Focus
16.description: Activate to reset the cooldown of Flash Heal

16.name: Holy Nova
16.description: After Anduin catches Divine Star, it explodes, healing nearby allied Heroes for 105 and damaging enemies for 150.{highlight} Also explodes at the apex.{/highlight}

16.name: Glyph of Faith
16.description: Leap of Faith gains a 2nd charge.

20.name: Light of Stormwind
20.description: Holy Word: Salvation grants allied Heroes Invulnerability instead of Protected. This does not affect Anduin. Channeling Holy Word: Salvation for its full duration reduces its cooldown by -61 seconds.

20.name: Inner Fire
20.description: The target of Light Bomb gains 40% Move Speed and 50 Armor for 3 seconds.

20.name: Censure
20.description: Chastise Stuns for 0.75 seconds and its Root duration is increased by 0.5 seconds.

20.name: Halo
20.description: {highlight}A holy area surrounds Anduin. Every time he basic attacks an enemy hero all allied units within this area are healed by 1% of their maximum health.{/highlight}
